title: Speedy houmous
directions: Put the chickpeas, garlic, lemon juice and yogurt into a food processor and pulse until fairly smooth. Season to taste, add more lemon juice to taste and sprinkle with smoked paprika or cayenne pepper if you want a bit of extra spice.
Keep in the fridge for up to 3 days and serve with your favourite crudit√©s or crispbreads (4 Ryvita Dark Rye crispbreads are a Healthy Extra 'b' choice..
ingredients: 2 tbsp lemon juice, plus extra to taste
Pinch of smoked paprika or cayenne pepper (optional)
